title: No, Really: These 5 Riders Could Usurp Tadej Pogačar at Strade Bianche
content:
Former champions, mad professors, and a super-wildcard make our pick of the outsiders for Strade's Tuscan dust-up.

Read the full article at No, Really: These 5 Riders Could Usurp Tadej Pogačar at Strade Bianche on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
